title: Return function to interpolate a cori color palette — cori_pal
code: cori_pal("ctg7") #> function (n)  #> { #>     x <- ramp(seq.int(0, 1, length.out = n)) #>     if (ncol(x) == 4L)  #>         rgb(x[, 1L], x[, 2L], x[, 3L], x[, 4L], maxColorValue = 255) #>     else rgb(x[, 1L], x[, 2L], x[, 3L], maxColorValue = 255) #> } #> <bytecode: 0x5577fbacc370> #> <environment: 0x5577fbacf058>

Color scale constructor for cori colors — scale_color_cori
text: palette Character name palette cori_palettes discrete Boolean indicating whether color aesthetic discrete reverse Boolean indicating whether palette reversed ... Additional arguments passed discrete_scale() scale_color_gradientn(), used respectively discrete TRUE FALSE

title: Color scale constructor for cori colors — scale_color_cori
code: ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Width, Sepal.Length, color = Species)) + geom_point(size = 4) + scale_color_cori() #> Error in ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Width, Sepal.Length, color = Species)): could not find function "ggplot"

title: Fill scale constructor for cori colors — scale_fill_cori
code: ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Width, Sepal.Length, color = Sepal.Length)) + geom_point(size = 4, alpha = .6) + scale_color_cori(discrete = FALSE, palette = "ctg7") #> Error in ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Width, Sepal.Length, color = Sepal.Length)): could not find function "ggplot"
